Text: Lucky that someone provides classic movies like these in this period of time. Dario Argento was a master and he knew horror like the back of his hand. Thanks for the upload @KrazyKarvs :) My rating A/V=10/10 . Guys please comment and give ur ratings too :) its the least we could do :)
totally agree with ani12, thanks so much for doing classics such as this one! i especially love rare ones from around the world, good job!
